episodes.title: The Cult of Woo: JZ Knight & Ramtha's School of Enlightenment
episodes.description: content warning: this episode mentions instances of childhood sexual abuse What does a suburban Pacific Northwest housewife, a former Irish priest and Q Anon members have in common? Well, they all co-sign the teachings of Ramtha: a 35,000-year-old warrior who speaks through a woman called JZ Knight, at her school of enlightenment. This week we're discussing JZ' Knights' early life, and looking at how she went from the daughter of a cotton-picking single Mother to the leader of one of the whackiest New-Age cults ever. episodes.title: QAnon: The Conspiracy Behind The Cult
episodes.description: QAnon is many things; a conspiracy theory, a digital phenomenon and according to many, a cult that has taken over the minds of their loved ones. This week we are deep-diving on the conspiracy theory behind QAnon, and asking how an online puzzle became possibly one of the world's largest cults. episodes.title: Tony Quinn & EDUCO: Ireland's Own NXIVM?
episodes.description: Today we're exploring the life of Tony Quinn, the Irish spiritual leader who built a global following with his Educo program, which has been accused of being a cult. We'll explore how Quinn's teachings, wealth and "psychic powers", led to his controversial rise in the oil industry, leaving a legacy of financial manipulation and psychological control. From his humble beginnings to his multi-million euro empire, discover the unsettling truth behind the man who convinced thousands to follow his path—and pay the price. Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Aum Shinrikyo: The Cult That Turned to Terrorism
episodes.description: In this episode, we explore the rise and fall of Aum Shinrikyo, the doomsday cult behind Japan's deadliest act of domestic terrorism. We’ll uncover how a seemingly spiritual group evolved into a deadly organization, leading to the infamous 1995 Tokyo subway sarin attack. Sign up for weekly deep dives & exclusive content Follow me on Instagram Follow Red Room on Instagram Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Japa Meditation Ireland: A Cult of Abuse
episodes.description: Cults are not always whacky organised communities that live in a commune... in fact, many modern-day cults exist right under our noses. New-age spiritual gurus have gentrified many of the legitimate practices of the East, like meditation and yoga, and used them to gain the trust of vulnerable individuals. Dennis Curran and Shashi Dubey were two of these gurus, who started Japa Meditation Ireland, and used it to abuse its members, financially, mentally and sexually. Sign up for weekly deep dives & exclusive content Follow me on Instagram Follow Red Room on Instagram Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Donegal's Cultish History: The Silver Sisterhood (Part 2)
episodes.description: Turns out there was not just one, but two cults that lived in that big 8-bedroom house in Donegal. In 1982, the house changed hands to a group called The Silver Sisterhood, but the people of Burtonport would not know any peace. While this group were quieter on paper, what they got up to within the house was another world of strange, we're talking Victorian era roleplay, caning and eh... video game development? BBC Sounds Docuseries Sign up for weekly deep dives & exclusive content Follow me on Instagram Follow Red Room on Instagram Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Donegal's Cultish History: The Screamers (Part 1)
episodes.description: On the North West Coast of Ireland is a small fishing village called Burtonport. On the surface, it is similar to many of Ireland's more rural villages however scratch the surface and you will hear stories of the cults that called it home for 20 years. Between 1974 and 1992, two cults chose Burtonport as their home, and brought controversy, news reporters and unrest to the otherwise sleepy village. Today we will look at The Atlantis Commune, otherwise known as "The Screamers"; a group that came from the UK to Donegal to practice primal scream therapy, led by Jenny James. Sign up for weekly deep dives & exclusive content Follow me on Instagram Follow Red Room on Instagram Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: *BONUS* A Deep Dive on Diddy: Violence, Abuse & Trafficking
episodes.description: CW: sexual abuse, domestic violence, grooming Sean Combs, also known as Puff, Puff Daddy, P Diddy and ‘Love’ has been one of the most prominent figures in hip hop for over 30 years. There have always been rumours about Puff’s personal life, from rumours of bisexuality to straight-up accusations of abuse - but the recent lawsuit filed by his long-time ex-girlfriend Cassie Ventura has opened up a pandora's box of accusations that he can no longer hide from. It has even reopened questions surrounding the mysterious death of his ex Kim Porter - who died in suspicious circumstances after she threatened to release a tell-all novel about Diddy and their relationship. This week we’re deep-diving on Diddy, and looking at all of his shady connections from the last 30 years. episodes.title: The Irish Exorcist: Malachi Martin, Hostage To The Devil
episodes.description: Did you know one of the world's most famous Exorcists was Irish? Father Malachi Martin was a fascinating man, who lived quite an incredible life. As well as studying The Dead Sea Scrolls, being fluent in Hebrew and Arabic and becoming a celebrity author, he was also a renowned Exorcist. This week we're looking at his life, legacy and the controversy surrounding the legitimacy of his claims about demonic possession. episodes.title: Danny Masterson, Scientology & The Trial That Exposed It All
episodes.description: Content Warning: In this episode of Red Room we discuss the details of Danny's Masterson's recent trial, where he was accused and convicted of two accounts of rape. In 2020, actor Danny Masterson - known mostly for his role on the early 2000s hit sitcom That 70s Show was charged with forcibly raping three women in separate incidents between 2001 and 2003. In an added layer of conspiracy, the Church of Scientology have been accused of covering up and enabling Masterson, by the victims; all three of whom were also practising Scientologists. This week we are deep diving on the trial, the accusations and focusing on the controversy now surrounding Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis; who not only got involved in the trial, but unveiled skeletons in their own closet. My Episode on Scientology & The Cult of The Celebrity Resources for victims of rape, sexual assault & sexual violence Links/Further Reading LAPD PROBING SCIENTOLOGY AND DANNY MASTERSON FOR MULTIPLE RAPES, COVER-UP | The Underground Bunker Danny Masterson's Accuser Tearfully Takes the Stand to Describe Alleged Rape Woman says she set boundaries, but actor Masterson raped her | AP News Actor Masterson's ex says she had to pull hair to stop rape | AP News `That 70s Show' actor Danny Masterson charged in 3 rapes | AP News Leah Remini speaks out after Danny Masterson's rape sentencing | EW.com Danny Masterson Allegedly Spit on Victim as She Fought Back During Rape, Woman Tells Court The Most Shocking Revelations From Danny Masterson's First Rape Trial - E! episodes.title: Do Secret Societies Run The World? | Bohemian Grove, The Freemasons & Cicada 3301 #RedRoomRevisits
episodes.description: This week we are exploring the world of Secret Societies. From Bohemian Grove to the Freemasons, these private boys clubs are often said to hold the world in the palm of their hand, members are apparently puppet masters of the universe and bred for success from the get-go.... but just how powerful are they really? We take a look at The Bohemian Club, Skull and Bones 322, The Freemasons, The Order of St Hubertus and Cicada 3301 and try to answer the question, do secret societies really run the world? ♦️WANT MORE RED ROOM?♦️Subscribe to WEEKLY episodes of Red Room: https://www.patreon.com/redroompod Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jenny.claffey/ Follow Red Room on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/redroom.pod/ --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/redroompod/message Hosted on Acast. episodes.title: I Was Warren Jeffs 65th Wife
episodes.description: This week on the pod I am speaking to Briell Decker.Briell was born and raised within the FLDS Church, a fundamentalist sect of the Latter Day Saints that practice Polygamy. Her life was never normal; she had no TV, was forced out of school before High School and she could not date or mingle with boys - any semblance of a normal teenage childhood was banned.Her life changed forever when she had just turned 18 and Warren Jeffs requested her to be married to him, as one of his then 64 wives. Briell's father brought her to the leader, and she was married instantly. Briell spent the next 8 years under the control of the FLDS Church, where she was drugged to keep quiet and all measures were taken to keep her within the organisation. This is her story, on how she escaped and how she took the power back.Watch her TedTalk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hWmsoCIuDn4&ab_channel=TEDxTalks--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/redroompod/message Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: The Good Witch! Patti Negri on Seances, Ghost Hunting, The Cecil Hotel & Everyday Witchcraft
episodes.description: This month's freebie is an amazing and fun interview with celebrity psychic-medium & Good Witch, Patti Negri!Patti Negri is a Psychic-Medium and "Good Witch" best known for her recurring role on the Travel Channel and Discovery Plus's #1 show GHOST ADVENTURES. She is the international best-selling author of OLD WORLD MAGICK FOR THE MODERN WORLD: Tips, Tricks and Techniques to Empower and Create a Life You Love. Patti's body of work includes appearances on dozens of shows including MASTER CHEF, AMERICA’S GOT TALENT, WipeOut, The Trevor Moore Show and Jeff Lewis' FLIPPING OUT.Patti has a popular weekly podcast called THE WITCHING HOUR.Patti's website: www.pattinegri.comWatch the video we mentioned, of Patti at The Cecil Hotel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zYMMzcJhHG4Sign up for weekly episodes: www.patreon.com/redroompod--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/redroompod/message Hosted on Acast. episodes.title: Scientology & The Cult of Celebrity
episodes.description: This week we take a deep dive into the Church of Scientology and their relationship to (and obsession with) celebrities. From alleged cover-ups, arranged marriages to using the charisma of the celebrity to spread their beliefs far and wide, there is no Scientology without the A-list celeb, and seemingly nothing they won’t do to keep their A-listers loyal followers.In this episode we cover the beginnings of this profitable relationship and how it was always L Ron Hubbard’s wish to be a celebrity Church. We also talk about how John Travolta got involved with Scientology, how they helped his career and reputation before casting him aside and how now, they seem to be doing little to cover his tracks. Of course we take a look at Tom Cruise, the Church’s alleged #2, and how the organisation have curated relationships, staff and an entire life for their most famous and devoted member. Video’s played Leah Remini interview at Scientology Celebrity Centre Hollywood 1998: https://youtu.be/FbENIJrPGyoJohn Travolta: Scientology has better tools than Catholicism: https://youtu.be/MEGVEqgGCMEJohn Travolta talks Scientology on Charlie Rose 1999: https://youtu.be/ArFPrqJvlwIJohn Travolta Talks About Scientology on Charlie Rose Show (2005): https://youtu.be/vGl907oeoeQScientology and Battlefield Earth: https://youtu.be/VHDk8YvgNlwTom Cruise Scientology Video - ( Original UNCUT ): https://youtu.be/UFBZ_uAbxS0Tom Cruise's Heated Interview With Matt Lauer: https://youtu.be/tFgF1JPNR5ETom Cruise's Freedom Medal of Valor acceptance speech at the church of Scientology: https://youtu.be/eZ8ciJZvjykFBI REPORTS & INVESTIGATIONSScientology Under FBI Investigation For Work Done For Tom Cruise: Report: https://www.huffpost.com/entry/tom-cruise-scientology-under-fbi-investigation_n_820250Nazanin Boniadi’s FBI testimony: Cast as Tom Cruise’s girlfriend by Scientology: https://tonyortega.org/2017/05/10/nazanin-boniadi-fbi-testimony-cast-as-tom-cruises-girlfriend-by-scientology/For weekly episodes of Red Room sign up to Patreon: www.patreon.com/redroompodFor all enquires about this podcast please contact redroompod@gmail.com--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/redroompod/message Hosted on Acast.
